page.title: 15WIS GREEN WILD ANIMALS
page.content: We have a toad and two slow worms in the garden. The toad hops around. I saw a hedgehog in the middle of the road. It was rolled up in a ball. It was all prickly. When I ws going home on the bus I saw a fox-cub run across the road. It stopped in the middle of the road when the bus went past. The bus just about missed it. I saw a grey squirrel running up a tree. It leapt from branch to branch. Then it held an acorn in its frail paws. I have seen badgers near our garden - sometimes they bring their cubs. Before I go to school I sometimes see some deer. They are roe deer. There are lots of rabbits around. They come out to play and they nibble the grass. Our cat brings dead moles to us.
